name: Potentially successful bruteforce
query:
sequence by user.name with maxspan=15s
      [ authentication where event.dataset == "auditd.log" and auditd.log.op == "login" and event.outcome == "failed"]
      [ authentication where event.dataset == "auditd.log" and auditd.log.op == "login" and event.outcome == "failed"]
      [ authentication where event.dataset == "auditd.log" and auditd.log.op == "login" and event.outcome == "failed"]
      [ authentication where event.dataset == "auditd.log" and auditd.log.record_type=="USER_AUTH" and event.outcome == "success"]
